text: is a railway station on the Osaka Loop Line in Osaka, Osaka Prefecture, Japan. == Layout == * There are an island platform and a side platform with two tracks elevated. ==Surroundings== * Ogimachi Station (Sakaisuji Line) * Kita Ward Office, Osaka * Tenjimbashisuji Shopping Arcade * Kids Plaza Osaka * Kansai Telecasting Corporation == Adjacent stations == Category:Osaka Loop Line Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1895
title: Temma Station
